resources.string:
"Obie - Well pa, I ain't so sure I am a human afterall.

Sherrif Andy - Is that so? That's mighty sad Obie.

Obie - What do we do pa? I am too scared. I aint want to be not human pa.

Sherrif Andy - Well simmer down, son. Tap on this button thing below and we will find the answer to it mighty fast.

Obie - Okay Pa."
